faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Do I need a lawyer to start a business in the UAE?
items.answer: While not legally required, having an expert lawyer ensures your business structure, contracts, and shareholder agreements are compliant with the relevant UAE laws.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me set up in a free zone or on the mainland?
items.answer: Yes! Our professional team of lawyers specialises in all three regions- free zone, mainland, and offshore. So, we take the time to assess your business needs and suggest the best-fit jurisdiction.

items.question: Do you review existing legal contracts?
items.answer: Absolutely. Our contract review services encompass both existing and future agreements.

items.question: Do you offer ongoing legal support for UAE-based businesses?
items.answer: Yes, we provide enterprise-level legal solutions to help you stay compliant as you grow.

items.question: How long does it take to draft a legal document?
items.answer: Most business contracts and agreements take 2-4 weeks to complete, depending on the requirements and complexity.
